CustomField.description: Automated field that calculates number of days at Reverted to Digicel based on working days
CustomField.formula: (Date_Status_Removed_Reverted_to_Digicel__c - Date_Status_Updtd_to_Reverted_to_Digicel__c) - ( FLOOR ( ( ( (Date_Status_Removed_Reverted_to_Digicel__c) - Date_Status_Updtd_to_Reverted_to_Digicel__c) / 7 ) ) * 2 ) + CASE(MOD ( Date_Status_Updtd_to_Reverted_to_Digicel__c - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7), 0,CASE( MOD ((Date_Status_Removed_Reverted_to_Digicel__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7),0,1,2 ), 1,CASE( MOD ((Date_Status_Removed_Reverted_to_Digicel__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7),0,2,1 ), IF(MOD( Date_Status_Updtd_to_Reverted_to_Digicel__c - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) - MOD((Date_Status_Removed_Reverted_to_Digicel__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) <= 0 ,0, IF(MOD((Date_Status_Removed_Reverted_to_Digicel__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) = 0,1,-2 ) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automated field that calculates number of days at Reverted to Digicel based on working days
CustomField.label: No of Days At Reverted to Digicel
